X-ray.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a beam of radiation(1) that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
X-ray.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a photograph of part of someone’s body, taken using X-rays to see if anything is wrong
X-ray.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
X-ray.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a medical examination made using X-rays
X-ray.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: I had to go to hospital for an X-ray.
X-ray.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays
X-ray.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The problem was only discovered when her lungs were X-rayed.
